name: PlanetSide2 : Supreme Authority Pack - Terran Republic
detailed_description:
Quell any rebellion or cultist uprising with the Terran Republic’s Supreme Authority Pack. Not only does it feature the TR’s most iconic array of infantry, vehicle and MAX weapons, it also includes a 50% 7-day squad XP boost and camouflage.

This bundle includes:

  • Zebra Camo TR: Combined Camo Tint Zebra Perm
  • Implant: Squad XP Boost - 7 Day
  • MR1 Fracture TR: MAX: Rocket Launcher 01: Right
  • MR1 Fracture TR: MAX: Rocket Launcher 01: Left
  • T4 AMP TR: Pistol 04:
  • T2 Striker TR: Rocket Launcher 04: ES
  • Digital Camo TR: Combined Camo Tint Digital Perm
  • T7 Mini-Chaingun TR: Chain Gun 01:
  • P525 Marauder-H Vehicle - Harasser - Weapon - Marauder-H - TR
  • P2-120 AP Vehicle - Prowler - Weapon - 120mm AP
  • G30 Vulcan Vehicle - Prowler - Weapon - Vulcan Chaingun
  • M14 Banshee Vehicle - Mosquito - Weapon - M14 Banshee - Nose Cannon

Note: The boost contained in this bundle will only be granted to the in-game character that redeems the bundle. Any other items will be granted to all characters of the appropriate faction.

short_description: Quell any rebellion or cultist uprising with the Terran Republic’s Supreme Authority Pack. Not only does it feature the TR’s most iconic array of infantry, vehicle and MAX weapons, it also includes a 50% 7-day squad XP boost and camouflage.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 or higher / AMD Phenom II X2 or higher
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 8600 series or higher / AMD or ATI 4850 series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Intel i5 processor or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 540 or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
